reviews: The dress is good . Material is fine . Good polished finish copper tinge. Nice evening wear . Everything else was true to size .. however... I found the size too small around the waist.  It has a side zip for easy wear but it does not close . Overall the other dress which I bought of the  same size was perfect so I guess its a stitching issue . Have asked for a bigger size . If it persists will ask for a refund or buy something else . Good dress but somehow seems to be a glitch ., Jeeez, I've never been happier with a dress as this one! The silky satin finish and the overall fit is... muah! However, the front flaps of this wrap dress may open as you sit or if it gets windy outside. The cut goes upto your belly button. So, watchout for that. But when a dress is as good as this one, it won't even feel like a settlement. Go for it! Still silently hoping that this dress won't become that commonplace., Believe me! This dress fits perfectly and is true to size.  For a more beautiful and clean look accessorize with a waist belt and see the magic! Worth the price paid!!!!? This look will compliment your skin tone as well ! Colour is as shown in the picture and is very comfortable to wear.?

Specifications: Sheath, V-Neck, Knee Length, Solid, Three-Quarter Sleeves, Puff Sleeves, Casual, Knitted Sheath, V-Neck, Knee Length, Solid, Three-Quarter Sleeves, Puff Sleeves, Casual, Knitted
reviews:
I hv yet to wear it but I wore it just to check and it looks awesome.will add a pic when I wear it.
So I wore it finally and the dress is just so perfect and modest. I am not a fan of revealing clothes so for me this is just the one. I hope you like what you see coz everyone did when I wore it.
Dress review- It is a bubbly polyester dress with cinched waist and a wrap bodice, which doesn't show un the pictures here.  You don't need any kind of skip or underdress as it is v opaque. Teem it with silver or gold accessories and its good to go. The sleeves are puffed and are 3/4 th in length.There is no slit and the fabric is stretchable so actually its not needed. I wore it for three hrs and it didn't need to iron or wash it. Just hang it for your next wear. The best part is its thick and you don't need either a wrap or a jacket in light winters.
I loved it, I was really scared and didn't know what to expect but to my pleasant surprise, the dress fit perfectly. It was a little loose in the lower part and that's what differentiates this from bodycon dress. For me it was a little beyond my knees. Only problem I'm facing personally with this is it reveals a bit of your cleavage and if you are not comfortable with it, you need to keep adjusting it. Other than than overall I loved it., This dress is so pretty and comfortable to wear.. It will compliment your body & perfect to wear in any occasion... The quality of the material is very gd, it's not at all transparent and breathable at the same time.. I'm 5'6",bust size -34 & I ordered S size & it fitted me perfectly.. Hope it will help u

reviews:
I purchased this dress after reading a lot of good reviews. Fabric is feather light, print is nice, it's sleeve and neck design are good. 

But in the product I received, there were lot of extra thread stitching faults. Finishing was not upto the standard. There were fabric ends unstitched and unfinished. Because it's dark color it's not prominently visible but for the price paid I would say the finishing of the product was poor. 

So overall design was good but finishing was poor for the price. I have purchased better quality dresses on Myntra at lower prices. So this review is in comparison with those and the prices. 

Dress looks nice when you were and click pictures and flaws are not visible. But if you are like me particular about those small details then I don't recommend buying this one., Amazing buy seriously ❤️ perfect fit perfect stitching .My best purchase ever from myntra in this 7 yrs of experience.Seriously guys if you are ok with the length just buy it . I was sceptical before buying bt now am glad I had my hands on this . (It doesn't come with a belt ), Very Pretty dress..loved it..perfect for evening or a day outing..got 1 size bigger one it fitted well but it was bit loose near shoulder and neck but manageable with spaghetti top..! Price lil high but worth buying..!

reviews:
Dear tempted to buy this customer, 
I know you must be really impressed by the ratings and reviews and are super tempted to buy this but please have a look at the pictures of this product after the FIRST wash. It shrank so bad that the pants became capri, the kurta got so tight on the chest and the Color just faded away so badly that one can imagine the cheapest cotton had been used to make this. And once this happens nobody will help you specially this Myntra that talks of how valued you are as a customer. The lady who owns this brand is no good either cause hello the incompetence is somehow on the higher end!! 
So please don’t fall for the pretty looks bad heavy ratings if this suit,unfortunately for us and fortunately for Myntra no body has uploaded the after wash!! Save the 1000 bucks you are going to spend on this!! Also you will find every other women wearing it so it’s not worth buying either ways!! RREFRAIN!!, Product Is good and vollla for those who love cotton.

Initially fabric will smell badly but may be after a wash that foul smell Will go...

Unfortunately it will fit to those who are very slim. I ORDERED S which generally fits but it was tight from Bust and hip. I AM sure if I order Medium it will be very loose., Material quality, design and the overall look is perfect of  this kurta set, worth buying. I bought an S Size , the fit was fine  just a Lil tight around the waist for me. If you are looking for a comfortable yet classy Indian Wear then this is definitely the best. ?

Got so many compliments over it. Above all it was a lottery for the price I paid. The only drawback is upon washing the print does go a bit and with every wash it fades off. So better not to machine wash., This combination of black and golden is just wow. Dupatta is superb. The fabric of the overall kurta set is awesome. 
Unfortunately, the S size pyjama is very tight for me but the kurta is perfect in size. Have requested for exchange. Let's hope M size fits me perfectly. ✌️



Updated Review-
I got M size pair and it's pyjama size is perfect now but kurti size is now loose but since this pair is amazing, I will alter the kurta and wear it.🙂
Thank you Myntra Team.

Go with white beads/stones juttis or heels and compliment it with a beautiful pair of jumkas that's all you have to do to rock any function 🤘, Perfect colour and fit. I ordered M size and it perfectly fits me. My height is 5'4 and weight is 62 kgs. Loved the outfit but only problem is that it's a handwash material, so do not machine wash bcz print will fade away and will become dull. Otherwise it's a pretty set for office wear or any occasion. I ordered it for Rakshabandhan.

I had ordered this dress with a great expectation. It has been in my wishlist for months. The material and the quality of dress is well guaranteed. But the stitching was horrible😐. As I marked up in the images, the width of the shoulder was longer, and the  hand was tighter. The stitching need to be perfect. I had an emergency function, and thats why I ordered it. So I couldn't even think of returning it and then I somehow managed to stitch it, shape it further and made somewhat better🥺.
I think, may be, as the demand for this item increased, the manufacturers haven't paid attention to details, instead they tried to produce it in mass. So please, don't make us customers disappointed next time.😪

Indo era no doubt have beautiful collections but their size is a bit smaller than your usual fit?anyways, beautiful dress that gives you elegant vibes?Thank you Myntra?, Awesome product ❤️

I recently purchased the "Bandhani Printed Regular Kurta With Trousers & Dupatta," and I must say, I'm absolutely delighted with my purchase. This ensemble is a true masterpiece that effortlessly blends traditional charm with contemporary elegance.

The first thing that caught my eye was the exquisite Bandhani print. The intricate patterns and vibrant colors exude a sense of cultural richness, and it instantly became the focal point of the outfit. The attention to detail in the design is impeccable, and it feels like wearing a piece of art.

The fabric is a dream to wear. Soft and lightweight, it drapes gracefully and allows for easy movement. The kurta's silhouette is flattering and offers a comfortable fit, while the trousers complement it perfectly, creating a well-balanced and stylish look.

The color combination of the dress itself is very appealing. The fabric is very Breathable and comfortable. The highlight of this dress is the neckline which is very different from the regular suites we buy . It can be worn for the office or for small gatherings. The fit is just right, making me feel confident and comfortable. The stitching is impeccable, showing attention to detail. The dress has a unique and stylish design that caught my eye. I wore it to a family gathering and received many compliments. It's become one of my favorite pieces in my wardrobe, and I'm looking forward to wearing it again.

reviews: Brought this for my mother. Kurta is really pretty. But it was a little tight on shoulders. Also the material of the cloth is so irritating that just after 2 minutes of trial my other got rashes on her skin.  I wish the material was softer and shoulders were a little wider. So getting it exchanged with another item. But if your skin isn’t that sensitive definitely try as the color and embroidery is so so pretty…, I wrongly ordered the item. Though I liked this product but i want to order the another product. But mistakenly this was ordered not the other . Surely I was surprised because I didn't place order but then I check my order list and found my mistake ?. But it came very good. There was a soft metirial inside the main metirial. So that is is comfortable. But there is a bad thing also that the dhuppatta is tooooooo short. Otherwise it is good., The material, color and the look of the set is very good. However, there were sizing and fit issues.The set runs a little tight compared to the sizing chart. The top is good till the waist area but a little tight at the stomach and hip area. Initially bought size XS based on the chart but exchanhed it to S. Even after exchanging the bottom is still tight around the bum. Overall it was okay.

They don't have an XS, so the S is slightly big - shoulders and sleeves. But I can turn up the sleeves into cuffs, it doesn't matter. The only thing I don't like is the drawstring at the bottom. All in all, very happy and an excellent buy. This is my third Roadster purchase - and have been happy with all of them. if anybody wants to buy this jacket I would suggest to buy one size smaller., The quality is impeccable.. It's comfortable to wear and also looks good.. But for me, the sleeves are too long and shoulder is too big..

The sleeves are tight, I bought xs size. Its ok if you wear it without having much outfits worn under it but If you wear a body warmer and some warm shirt or kurta and over this denim jacket than only the sleeves will become tight to move while rest of the measurement are correct for bust,shoulder,waist.
And . In reviews,I saw that the sleeves has fur but my jacket sleeves are furless .only the sleeves are without fur while there is fur all over the jacket except sleeves.
Look is good., Fabulous product as compared to flaying machine jacket they give fur inner side expect sleeves. If you are buying this for winter than go for it. I have ordered xs & s size. Returning xs for size issue only. Only difference in both is 1 inch in all dimensions. Here is sizes
 S size
Sleeve 23
Shoulder  14
Length 23.5
Bust 37

Xs size

Shoulder 13
Length 22.5
Bust 36 

Thanks to roadster., Overall as a product this is good. The design and denim quality is good. And the fit is also good. In respect to the thickness and quality of the fleece, it's mediocre. Fleece is not thick or of good quality. It's just a thin layer of fleece. So you have to pair it up with pull over as a later. Style wise it looks good. And can provide you a smart layer to your overall outfit. Point to be noted, hands don't have fleece on them. Don't expect it to protect you from harsh cold. But it can be worn in mild cold weather. Go for it if you're getting it under 600. Giving 3.5 starts out of 5.

Fit is as expected (a bit loose for me as i usually wear XS) but if you are a size S (bust 34) this is gonna fit you perfect. Wish there were more XS (bust 33) sizes available.

reviews:
This jeans is a boon to curvy girls everywhere. I'm 5'3" with a 29" waist and a pear shape. My waist is much smaller than my thighs and behind, so I never owned a pair of jeans that fit well and I don't wear jeans that often that I'd spend 2k+ on Levi's curvy. 
Get the size that would fit your waist if you're curvy/bottom heavy. It'll fit your thighs and behind perfectly. It's high rise and looks cool. Feels comfortable and it's loose fit so the non-stretchable material isn't an issue, you can move around in it comfortably. The colour is not exactly the same as that shown in the pics but close enough., The jeans is very very comfortable...as I am a new Mom I was looking for something comfortable nd it was as I expected...I ordered a size 34 for me. It's bit loose for me but I have no issues with it. I love the baggy look it gives. Happy with it., This is the jeans I was searching for. This is very much comfy and I do hope if i wear it the whole day I won't feel exhausted as I like to wear loose comfortable clothes to work. Normally jeans comes too tight and by the end of the day I am irritated with my tight jeans and my skin is full of rashes. I hope it will give chance to my skin to breathe.

I bought this jeans cause I wanted high rise. but It was mid rise for me. it looked high waisted on the model and looked very good on her. I have read reviews saying that the colour fades after a wash or the zip breaks in a month, but I haven't worn it enough to see that happen. I also don't really like the fact that ot doesn't fit my waist perfectly but that's mostly a "me problem"


edit after 8 months:
I have grown to like the jeans. also it hasn't faded much with washing. fits not bad now too., Fit me really well but i was thought is full flare but flare starts from knee and light faded jean. 
But over all is really good so i keep it. I ordered mu actul size 28 fit me perfect.

product_name: Women Black Boyfriend Fit High-Rise Clean Look Jeans

reviews: Great product ! Plus gud fittin honestly it's not that bad. However others are over exaggerating the qualities of product ! It indeed is such a normal cool product plus comfortable all i wanted is a comfortable product don't have any issues. Tho it's exactly what i was expecting but due to it's length (it's longer than I've expected) that's y givin 4 stars overall such a great product loved it ! :)), Fitting is as shown in the picture, not stretchable, and jeans is quite hard material but not too thick, you can definitely wear it for Summers, I did! At the given price it's definitely worth it! I ordered 26 size, but as it's high rise it fit everywhere perfectly but not my high rise waistline , so I had to alter it a bit to fit it right to my waist, but my waist is tiny in general it might not be an issue for you all. Other than that there's no issue with this jeans! Even after washing the colour seems to be the same so no fade so far!, Overall fit is really good. My size is 28. However it is not high waisted, at least on me, it reaches my belly button. I'm 5'8" and it's ankle length. Now, the quality of the jeans is not very good BUT it is not bad. The material is a little rough (which I don't mind), but not thick. It feels like a thinner material. However, it is ok and kinda balanced since the texture is little rough. I'd love it more if the material was a bit thicker than how I received it and a bit high waisted. Otherwise it is a decent mid rise jeans. I like it.

reviews: First of all thanks to Myntra for fast n early delivery much before the expected date. Jeans is of good quality. It's quite stretchable n as mentioned gives a good high rise. Perfect for crop tops. Color is pure black. Gives a clean, smart n good look when worn. It's a tiny bit lose for me at the zip area n below the knee area but it's quite unnoticeable. Only concern is the buttons used in the jeans. The front part of the button might come out pretty fast as it's not too sturdy. But overall the jeans is pretty good at this price. Just loved it?, Very stretchable and it is awesome not too much high also and not too much low also. And the colour is too much dark it is good overall you are thinking to buy Black jeans go for it and Thank you Myntra and high star and myntra for this Super ?jeans. ????, Awesome fit, really dark black colour which is perfect, length is perfect. I would have given it a 5 star. But the only concern is the button. It kind of in 2 parts. The front part comes off. Not broken. Its the style. If the front part of the button comes off when you are wearing it and you are outside nd it get lost. Then this will be a serious problem. First time o wore it the button came off. So this is the only issue. I am keeping it as the fit is too good for me.

product_name: Women Black Slim Fit High-Rise Clean Look Stretchable Jeans
Specifications: Clean Look, High-Rise, No Fade, Dark, Slim Fit, Regular, With belt loops, Stretchable Clean Look, High-Rise, No Fade, Dark, Slim Fit, Regular, With belt loops, Stretchable
reviews:
Really happy with this purchase. I did not expect that buying jeans online would be this perfect. Worth the price.I'm 5'5 and this jeans is above my ankle. I usually buy jeans size 32 as purchasing through online i thought it would be small for me and i ordered 34, but 34 size is really big for me, correct fit for my thighs but really loose towards the waist and calf and it look more like parallels than jeans,need to alter the waist and calf areas, stretchable cloth, the waist is high rise and the rise reach upto my abs., I had ordered size 34 seeing all those reviews that the product comes a bit loose than the normal chart. So I thought of going for 34. When the product came it was still so loose as it had a high waist. I had to exchange it with 32. The worst part is that, below the knee it's too loose and lengthy and the thigh part is tight. Overall it's an okay product. But not a good one. And one more thing to mention is that the buttonholes aren't really stitched and white threads appear on the outline which is a little odd to see. 
Now I don't wear it.. maybe once or twice I have worn it. It was a bad choice. I regret it, This jeans is a must have, and thank god I bought it. It fits so perfectly and hugs the right places of my body as well. I wear it like almost everyday, whether it be w a western top or beneath a kurti. It gives a v clean and sexy look and it's material is also v good. One thing : It's not stretchable at all so order accordingly. Overall it's a perfect piece of clothing you should have in your wardrobe for casual, daily or party purposes as it goes well w everything.❤️

reviews:
Appearance of the product is same as shown in the picture. Meterial is cotton as said in the product description. But the sizeing information provided is insufficient to choose the right size. They have only provided the weist measurement. And that is incorrect too. My weist size is 83cm even though I ordered size L (with weist size of 81 cm) and the product l received was too lage both at the weist and chest. In the product tag they mentioned it at L size with 94cm as chest measurement. But that was also wrong.
 I am very much disappointed with this purchase., I am 5'2", chest size 36, and medium built. I ordered M. I am sure I can fit well into S, but i am sticking to M coz it may shrink too. I can easily get into and out of the dress without using the zip. Infact I didn't realise there was a side zip too. Anyway, it's a lovely product. product_name: Women White Solid Ankle-Length Leggings
Specifications: Cotton, Elastane, Ankle Length, Single, Ethnic, Solid, Machine Wash Cotton, Elastane, Ankle Length, Single, Ethnic, Solid, Machine Wash
reviews:
I tried out this brand on the basis of the other reviews and I'm happy I purchased white leggings of this brand. The fit is amazing. As I'm petite I have a couple of gathers at my ankle, but I don't mind it. 
Since it's white, the transparency is 60/40. 60% being opaque. Usually with white I'm careful to wear kurtas much below my hip.

In short, I love elasticity, the thickness is perfect and not too tight on the waist.

Happy happy., Am a small when it comes to most leggings brands. Had bought size medium. Turned out to be small. As in the fabric was too tensely stretched out around my limbs. So ordered a L. Limbs part fit perfectly. But mow its bit loose around the waist and hip., Highly recommended if you want your leggings fitted tightly.. fabric is damn comfortable, stitching is also excellent and I just loved it.. Go for it without hesitation ?

reviews:
This is light golden. If you are confused about light vs dark golden of twinbirds leggings, let me help out. If you are medium-dusky skintone, go for this light golden leggings. Basically go for the opposite colour of your skintone. The dark golden blended perfectly with my skin, it was as if I wasn't wearing any clothing at all. If twinbirds made stockings out of the same material in dark golden, I'd be the first one to grab it., The shimmering effect is not much. When u look closely it shines from far the effect is less visible. Cloth is good. This is size L. Fit is good. If u want a darker shade I suggest u buy gold toned of the same brand., I’m so happy with the purchase.. 
Twin Birds are the best.. they never disappoint.. though sometimes I feel they are expensive but their products are worth buying..

product_name: Women Black Cotton Lycra Saree Blouse for Women
Specifications: Cotton, Elasticated, Round Neck, Three-Quarter Sleeves, Daily, No Cotton, Elasticated, Round Neck, Three-Quarter Sleeves, Daily, No
reviews:
What a Fit ?? Fantastic.... The material is strong  as well as stretchable. Neither thick nor thin, neither heavy nor transparent. Just the perfect blend of material & stretch material. Black shade is perfect not dull at all. The fit on the body is amazing, the neck line & waistline is awesome. One Size, I wear 40/42 in readymade of Salwar Studio & it fit me well. 1 or 2 Bigger Size than me can fit in well too. Go ahead ladies match it smartly with Silk, Cotton Sarees.... matches perfectly with all saree material, Vendor needs to show size-chart. Merely by mentioning free-size does'nt mean it would fit any size .  Took a chance knowing the risk and bought. but i feel my review would be helpful to others when it came to knowing the size for this blouse. this blouse is good for anybody up-to size 40 or 42 inch bust size only. beyond that you cannot get into it. 

Vendor pls take note and make bigger sizes for 44 onwards too, Very comfortable... I rarely wear sarees and blouse always make me feel uncomfortable. Slip-on blouses are best option.. Hassel free,

product_name: Women Multi Cream Printed Moss Floral Open Shrug
Specifications: Polyester, Printed, Three-Quarter Sleeves, Casual, Crop, Floral Print, Machine Wash, Straight Polyester, Printed, Three-Quarter Sleeves, Casual, Crop, Floral Print, Machine Wash, Straight
reviews:
Vibrant and colourful. 
The material is similar to polyster. 
There is a lining inside, which is again polyster kind
The overall look is good, however, the fitting of the arm is somewhat uncomfortable. It does not flow easily and feels a little light on the underarm. 
I usually buy L size, but for this brand I got M, the bust is okay, but the arm was tight. 

Overall it looks good. Can give it a try. I got it on discount. Hence happy with the purchase., Vibrant and beautiful print.. But would be more body friendly and wearable if the lining was made of cotton. Both outer and inner fabric is polyester, which automatically reduces the versatility of the shrug since it cannot be used in warmer seasons and places and can't be an option for those of us who are sensitive to certain fabrics.
Really sad to return the item as I really loved the print and colours. Please make it with a firmer cotton lining., On the first look, the shrug look amazing, and so does it is. However, I am unhappy with the way it falls on arms. The arms are stiched straight, need to do some alterations to make the sleeves look better, otherwise it's a decent product.
The fabric is synthetic with an inner synthetic lining, which renders it unusable during summers.

reviews: The slit is amazing. It's thick and soft with knitted work and has zip closure at the back but it has no hook to make the zip more secure. True to size and length. Amazing buy., The skirt was not A-line neither was it bodycon. It was a very weird shaped product and looked very bad on wearing it. The material of the skirt was too thick and not stretchable or flexible., Although the fabric is fine and usable in the summers (not cotton though), the skirt is not woven as you'd expect, but has two panels of woven fabric at the front and the back, the rest of the skirt being plain. The slit is placed awkwardly between these two panels at the front, also effectively placing it smack in the middle of your thigh instead of at the side. I would add more photos but they take up more than 5MB.
